pages.text: The $(major)Item Attraction Field/$ Gene causes players to $(minor)grab items from a much larger distance/$.$(br2)This Gene is disabled when the player has an active $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/anti_field_orb)Anti-Field Orb/$, is near an active $(l:geneticsresequenced:blocks/anti_field_block)Anti-Field Block/$, or when sneaking.$(br2)This Gene $(bad)cannot be given to mobs/$.
